uk.ac.uea.framework

Class Pool<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.uea.framework.Pool<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Generic object

    public class Pool<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class designed to link generic objects in a data structure in a way that makes it extensible and usable for any app. Allows a new object to be added, size allowing, as well as previous specific objects to be deleted by reference. Acts as a first-in, last-out data structure.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Pool.PoolObjectFactory<T>
      Abstract factory, allows object-specific insantiations.

      List of objects
      private int maxSize
      Max size of the pool

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pool(Pool.PoolObjectFactory<T> factory, int maxSize)
      Constructor that sets up the factory, using an arraylist structure as a basis for the free object list

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void free(T object)
      Adds the specifide object to the list of free objects, assuming the size does not exceed maximum.
      T newObject()
      Adds a new object to the pool, if the pool is full, the first object in the pool is removed and the new one is added.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
